lead_paragraph: RUSSO--Theresa. We mourn the loss of the kind and courageous Theresa Russo. The viewing will be at the Joseph A. Lucchese Funeral Home, 726 Morris Park Ave. in The Bronx on February 23rd from 4-8pm. The Mass will be at St. Clare of Assisi Church, 1918 Pulding Ave. in The Bronx at 9:45am on February 24th followed by burial at Mount Pleasant Cemetery, 80 Commerce St. in Hawthorne, NY. Shiva will be held at 2845 University Ave., Apt. 2H on Thursday, February 25th, all day and until 6:00pm on Friday, February 26th. She leaves husband Michael Friedman and stepson Murray Friedman. She was the rock for all of us and will be missed. 1/3
